item.title: Learn, todo and done 10-15/20
item.description: Learn php docker To-do Study github issues assigned by Peter Github workflow: 1. git checkout develop 2. git branch ken_issues 3. change the source code 4. test after change using docker 5. git add, commit, push 6. git message in present imperative tensehu 7. create a pull request on issue#
